WorkTypeGroupDataTranslation.name: WorkTypeGroupDataTranslation
WorkTypeGroupDataTranslation.description: Represents the translated values of the data stored within a WorkTypeGroup recordâ€™s fields.

Description.description: The translated value for the WorkTypeGroup description.

IsOutOfDate.description: Indicates whether the translation is out-of-date (true) or current (false). A translation is out-of-date if the parent WorkTypeGroup record is updated after the last translation was filed.

Language.description: The language for these translated values.

Name.description: The translated value for the WorkTypeGroup record name. This field is required to translate the text in other fields.

ParentId.description: The record ID of the WorkTypeGroup associated with the data that is being translated.
